function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction workers being exposed to COVID-19 on construction sites","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 among construction workers, leading to illness and potential fatalities","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety measures on construction sites, providing personal protective equipment (PPE), and enforcing social distancing protocols","Technologies":"Health monitoring and contact tracing technologies to track and contain potential outbreaks","People":"Construction workers, site managers, construction companies","Owner":"Site managers, construction companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of diversity and inclusion in construction companies","Impact":"Limited diversity and inclusion leading to a less resilient and adaptable workforce, and potential discrimination","Mitigation":"Implementing diversity and inclusion training, creating inclusive workplaces, and promoting diversity in hiring practices","Technologies":"Diversity and inclusion software for recruitment and employee engagement","People":"Construction companies, employees, HR departments","Owner":"Construction companies, HR departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate mental health management practices in the construction industry","Impact":"Increased mental health issues among construction workers, impacting productivity and well-being","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support services, training managers in mental health awareness, and fostering a supportive work environment","Technologies":"Mental health apps for stress management and employee assistance programs","People":"Construction workers, managers, HR departments","Owner":"Construction companies, HR departments"}]}
